arts.ttl: Manchester City vs Arsenal: Latest City injury news and predicted City starting eleven ahead of today’s match
arts.sum: Manchester City face Arsenal today at the Emirates Stadium. Although the game comes early in the 25/26 season, it is a crucial Premier League fixture. Pep Guardiola’s side will be looking to continue the momentum they’ve built with wins over Manchester United and Napoli in their past two matches. arts.ttl: The stats that show Arsenal can nullify Haaland
arts.sum: Erling Haaland is once again in red-hot form and appears unstoppable as he pushes towards another Premier League Golden Boot. The Norwegian forward has developed a reputation for scoring in virtually every circumstance, even when Manchester City fall short collectively. arts.ttl: Guardiola forced to make late decision on Rodri inclusion ahead of Arsenal clash
arts.sum: The decision on whether to put Rodri into the Manchester City line-up against Arsenal will come with late notice after the Ballon d’Or winner felt ‘uncomfortable’ in training before their opening Champions League game against Napoli on Thursday, according to manager Pep Guardiola. “Wednesday for example, the training session, he didn’t feel comfortable, he didn’t train good but said ‘no, no, I’ll be fine tomorrow’ and played extraordinarily, like Rodri is.

arts.ttl: Owen Hargreaves says he will be shocked if 'extraordinary' player doesn't start for Arsenal vs Man City
'Pick them off' - How Arsenal can play into Gyokeres's hands against Man City
arts.sum: Arsenal can play into Viktor Gyokeres's hands against Manchester City on Sunday and will not fear defeat against their former perpetual nemesis, Charles Watts has told Sports Mole.
